body:
So it's been a month now since Ironsoldier and I released the first issue of the AvPost. You can see it here if you fancy a read: http://avicus.net/forums/144889a25. It was relatively well received, but unfortunately we just haven't had the time to start on another due to other outside commitments. Well, I lie actually, I have made a first draft of my blog, but that's nowhere near to being finished. 

My question to y'all is would you like to see another one? And what would you want to see in it.
There would most likely be
- A main story, written by me
- Leaderboards/teams talk, written by iron
- Two blogs, written by iron and I
- Possibly a story, written by SpicyTunaRoll (if he's still down for it)
- A interview, conducted and written by me

Any feedback, comments or opinions would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks

title: Another AvPost?

replies.body:
Bring it back with:
- A interview, conducted and written by me
- A main story, written by me
- Two blogs, written by iron and I
- Possibly a story, written by SpicyTunaRoll (if he's still down for it)

(All the "me" are awesome_apricot, I copyed and pasted the things here)

replies.body:
So the teams/leaderboards should be scrapped? Fair point, however some may have enjoyed reading.

I found this suggestion, lost on the old post, and quite liked it.

Idea: about a five scene cartoon about funny things on avicus like jokes and epic fails - Whale_warrior
